decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the approved materials, and so maintained at all times thereafter. The approved materials are detailed on plans reference P01459 - C701 Rev F and P01459 - C700 Rev F received on 21/07/2015, and the Timber cladding and Window sample received on 04/09/2015, Plan reference P01459-P110 received on 16/09/2015 and brick and paving block sample received on 25/09/2015 approved under application 01145/F/P19(2,6-8,13,14) and 5 x Render samples received on 04/12/2015 comprising 1 x weber.plast TF150 in Winter White, 1 x weber.plast TF150 in Baja Blue, 1 x weber.sil P TF150 in Winter White,1 x weber.plast TF150 in Sky Blue, 1 x weber.plast TF150 in Liquid mercury approved under application 01145/F/P19(2i).

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the details and plans approved under application reference 01145/F/P19, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for a school and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the Soft Landscape Management Plan and Hard Landscape Management Plan received 05/08/2015, plan reference P01459-P652 Rev E received on 16/09/2015 and plan reference 498801 Rev E received on 18/09/2015 approved under reference 01145/F/P19(2,6-8,13,14).
Any trees or shrubs planted which die within five years of completion of the development shall be replaced with the same species, and of comparable maturity, or an approved alternative. The landscape strategy and management plan shall be carried out as approved and maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 6 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the site investigation report Geo-Environmental Investigation and Assessment for Bluesky Design Services dated February 2015 received on 09/07/2015, approved under reference 01145/F/P19(2,6-8,13,14).
b. If required, a scheme for decontamination of the site shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority, for written approval. The scheme shall account for any comments made by the Local Planning Authority before the development hereby permitted is first occupied.
During the course of the development:
c. The Local Planning Authority shall be notified immediately if additional contamination is discovered during the course of the development. A competent person shall assess the additional contamination, and shall submit appropriate amendments to the scheme for decontamination in writing to the Local Planning Authority for approval before
any work on that aspect of development continues.
Before the development is first brought into use:
d. The agreed scheme for decontamination referred to in clauses b) and c) above, including amendments, shall be fully implemented and a written validation (closure) report submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval.

Condition : 7 - All work on site shall be carried out in accordance with the Construction Phase Plan Appendices A, B, C, D, E, F,G,I,J,K,L,P received on 08/06/2015, Traffic management Plan received on 21/09/2015, Construction Phase Plan produced by McAvoy Group Limited received on 02/10/2015 and approved under reference 01145/F/P19(2,6-8,13,14).

Condition : 8 - Within 6 months of the date of occupation of the building approved under permission reference 01145/F/P19, the temporary building, hardstanding and fencing shown on plan reference P-01459 ? P660 received on 17/03/2016 and referred to in this application shall be removed from the site and the ground returned to grass.

Condition : 9 - Prior to occupation of the building approved under permission reference 01145/F/P19, an energy statement that shows how the development will follow the hierarchy of energy efficiency, decentralized energy and renewable energy technologies set out in the London Plan (2011) Chapter 5 (particularly Policy 5.2) and demonstrates the carbon emissions of the proposed development at each stage of the energy hierarchy and also provides evidence of the Target Emissions Rate (TER) and Building Emissions Rate (BER), should be submitted and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 10 - Prior to occupation of the building approved under permission reference 01145/F/P19, a Travel Plan that includes proactive targets, measures and an action plan to reduce car travel shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 11 - Prior to occupation of the building approved under permission reference 01145/F/P19, a Car Park Management Plan, including evidence and confirmation that further car parking spaces have been secured, as well as proposals to provide alternatives to prevent on-street parking, including a review mechanism and mitigation, allocation of spaces for visiting staff/therapists, vehicle circulation within the site and management of drop off and pick up should be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 12 - The northern access to the site shall be entry only, and the southern access to the site shall be exit only, and appropriate signage shall be provided at both accesses in accordance with plan reference P01459-P652 Rev E received on 16/09/2015 approved as part of the Landscape Strategy under permission reference 01145/F/P19(2,6-8,13,14).

Condition : 13 - Prior to the occupation of the development cycle parking facilities shall be installed in accordance with the details approved under permission 01145/F/P19(2,6-8,13,14);
Photographs of Proposed Cycle Shelter received on 08/06/2015 and siting shown on P01459-P652 Rev E received on 16/09/2015.
description:
Variation of condition 9 of planning permission 01145/F/P19 dated 18/3/2015 to allow temporary building to be occupied by Logic Studio School. For construction of a new two storey 96 place special educational needs school with associated hard/soft landscaping and car parking with re-configuration of existing college
car park.
